name: Night Vigil
description:
When a character receives healing apart from Hunter's Vigil, it is replaced by an equivalent amount of Bond of Life.
After the character to which this is attached uses a Normal Attack: The Physical DMG dealt is converted to Electro DMG, and said character gains 2 stacks of Bond of Life.
Duration (Rounds): 1
descriptionraw: When a character receives healing apart from <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S14122]</color>, it is replaced by an equivalent amount of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character to which this is attached uses a Normal Attack: </color>The $[K100] dealt is converted to $[K104], and said character gains 2 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 1</color>
